Rust Inventory

{{ item.classid }} {{ item.amount }} {{ item.name }} {{ item.marketHashName }} {{ item.lowestPrice }}
import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { RustItemsResponse} from '../interfaces/rust-items-response'; import { MarketDataResponse } from '../interfaces/market-data-response'; @Component({ selector: 'app-fetch-data', templateUrl: './fetch-data.component.html' }) export class FetchDataComponent { private _sleepDuration: number = 1000; private _baseUrl: string = ''; public rustItems: RustItemsResponse = {}; public tradeables: Array = []; constructor(http: HttpClient, @Inject('BASE_URL') baseUrl: string) { http.get(baseUrl + 'Steam/GetInventory').subscribe(async result => { this.rustItems = result; if (this.rustItems.inventoryItems) { // log market call console.log('staring market call for ' + (this.rustItems.inventoryItems.length -1) + ' items.'); // get only tradable items let filteredArray = this.rustItems.inventoryItems.filter(function (val, i, a) { return val.tradable === 1; }); // debug console.log(filteredArray); // setinitial lowest price this.rustItems.inventoryItems.map((obj) => { obj.lowestPrice = '--'; return obj; }) // loop inventory for (var i = 0; i < filteredArray.length - 1; i++) { // only process if item is tradable // if (this.rustItems.inventoryItems[i].tradable) { // get the market hash name let mhn = filteredArray[i].marketHashName ?? ''; // create url base and URI encode the market hash name let url = baseUrl + 'Steam/GetMarketData/' + encodeURI(mhn) + '/1'; // get the market data http.get(url).subscribe(result => { // declare market data from the results let marketData = result; // log market details console.log('found market details for ' + mhn + ' lowest price = ' + marketData.lowest_Price); // get from original arry if (this.rustItems.inventoryItems) { // find index from main list var foundIndex = this.rustItems.inventoryItems.findIndex(x => x.assetid == filteredArray[i].assetid); // update the orig list with the new price value this.rustItems.inventoryItems[foundIndex].lowestPrice = filteredArray[i].lowestPrice; // log price to console console.log('set price data to ' + filteredArray[i].lowestPrice); } //// null check //if (this.rustItems.inventoryItems) { // // set the lowest price // this.rustItems.inventoryItems[i].lowestPrice = marketData.lowest_Price; // // log price to console // console.log('set price data to ' + this.rustItems.inventoryItems[i].lowestPrice); //} }, error => console.error(error)); //} // log current process number console.log('processed ' + i + ' of ' + (filteredArray.length - 1)); // log sleep console.log('sleeping for ' + this._sleepDuration + ' ms'); // sleep to avoid steam rate limiter await new Promise(f => setTimeout(f, this._sleepDuration)) } } }, error => console.error(error)); //console.log(this.tradeables); } }
